title: Order Shuffler
description: Enter names or items and generate a random order instantly.
helper: Separate items with new lines or commas.

result.title: Shuffled Order
result.empty: No result yet. Shuffle the list to generate an order.

validation.min: Please enter at least two items.

toast.noResult: There is no result to copy.

openGraph.title: Order Shuffler
openGraph.description: Create a random order from your list of names or items. Perfect for presentation order, team rotations, and everyday decision making.
